text: In early 2023, we visited Costa Rica as a recommendation of a close friend. We fell in-love with it the moment we landed. The mountains, coastline, lush rainforest, wildlife, food, people and culture are all so beautiful. We knew we wanted to make this our second home.
We bought this beautiful condo unit built in 2024 as our second, eventually retirement, home and we thought we would share it with other people to enjoy as much as we do.

The unit was thoughtfully furnished by a local custom-quality furniture and design company called Hohm, with a goal of creating a tranquil, warm and homey space for guests to enjoy during their getaway to Costa Rica.

If there is anything we can do to make your stay better, please don't hesitate to ask. If we make your stay memorable, we hope you will leave us a positive 5-star review. Vista Monte Mar is a new airbnb and achieving high rated reviews would mean the world to us and will help motivate us in providing an enjoyable accommodation for more guests to come. We thank you in advance for supporting us! We hope that you enjoy your stay!
